Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 5 WARRIOR UAVs KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ Russian occupiers are on...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mykola Oleshchuk⚡️ 5 ARGUMENTY UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 16, 2024, the Russian occupiers were hit by 3 ballistic missiles - Iskander-M-, 3-type attack UAV -Shahed by 2 drones of an unidentified type from the Kursk region.💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle by mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces and by the REB of the Air Force, all the UAVs were shot down near Poltavsk, Kirovograd, Odessa and Mykolayiv regions. 🇺🇦 Together - until victory!➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander of the Air Force, Lieutenant General Mikola Oleshchuk
